nodes.text: Walking the Path That's Given is a story from Star Wars Tales 21 and collected in Star Wars Tales Volume 6. It was going to be the first part in a serial, in the manner of "Nomad", but Star Wars Tales was cancelled after only the first part.
It features ex-CIS starfighter ace Nas Ghent and his recruitment by Darth Vader to create the Black Eight Squadron, an elite Imperial squadron.
